website_summaries.verdict: One of the more popular floor squeegees, this helpful product allows you to sweep and squeegee all in one go.
pros: Able to sweep/squeegee both dry and wet areas
Rubber broom bristles are resistant to water
cons: Many customers complained that the broom was much smaller than anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Where has this broom been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Saw this broom at the hair dresser and thought it would be good for sweeping up dog hair too. Love It! Works great on my hard wood floors and linoleum kitchen. Also love that you can practically put it parallel to the floor and get under the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Renea

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It requires some strength and patience but it pays off. It gets fur and hair that you could never get with a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: My favorite new broom
customer_reviews.text: If you have not tried this broom, I highly recommend it. I have several pets and a traditional broom always seems to leave hair behind, however this broom leaves no hair behind. I actually found this broom while at the hair stylist and the word in the hair market is, this is the only broom several salons use since it does such a great job with hair.
customer_reviews.author: Goose2u

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgraded version of my previous rubber broom (yellow handle). As usual, you get what you pay for. This is a seemingly indistructable unit and I am sure it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works very well in getting animal hair out of your ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in getting animal hair out of your carpet so you don't burn out your vacuum beater bar
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Pull don’t push
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 dogs and hardwood floors. There is ALWAYS dog hair. This is a good tool between vacuuming. Wish it came with a dust pant hat clips to the side. This tool comes with a solid wood handle. Others don’t. It makes a difference. When sweeping pull don’t push!
customer_reviews.author: Not a big shopper

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Broom and Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: I'm the proud owner of two of these great Rubber/Squeegee Brooms. I recently parted with one and decided to replace the one I gave away. I need one upstairs and downstairs. I gave one of my brooms to a fellow co-worker, at my little part time job, she is standing in water during the cleaning process of a ORANGE JUICE extractor. The Rubber Squeegee is easy to handle and catches almost every drop of water. I use the BROOM to gather cat hairs and use the Squeegee part to gather the water during my deep cleaning of my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Marion D Zottarelli

customer_reviews.title: Squeegee will not stay on handle
customer_reviews.text: Rubber squeegee pops loose from handle. I requested to return for replacement or refund and have not been able to hear back
customer_reviews.author: dlight

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning addition when you have cats in the house!
customer_reviews.text: This broom is very well built: the handle never comes apart and is solid metal. The brush section is a soft rubber and really gets cat fur off a carpet in one sweep. I highly recommend this broom if you have a long-haired cat for cleaning your carpets and floors; it will definitely get the fur off quicker and faster than just vacuuming it up.
customer_reviews.author: madamemusico

customer_reviews.title: I had a broom like this for almost 10 years and it broke
customer_reviews.text: I had a broom like this for almost 10 years and it broke. I realized after getting this that my old broom was making me work harder too. This was smaller than my original broom from probably another manufacturer. It is more convenient though. I can reach it under my couch and fit it into smaller areas with more efficiency and less time used. This is a great product. Thank you so much. 09/2020. Still have this broom and love it for sweeping on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Cedars

customer_reviews.title: Good for couch, disappointing on rugs
customer_reviews.text: Between my long hair and my two cats - there’s too much hair in my house. Vacuuming clearly wasn’t getting all the hair up out of the rugs. I thought this would be an easy pre-vacuum tool to get the surface hair out of the rug fibers. It’s not. Practically useless on the rugs. The bristles don’t seem firm enough to really grab and remove the hair. They’re very flexible and flimsy - not what you want to wrestle hair out of rug fibers. The broom head also keeps falling off the handle. I’m keeping it because it does work nicely on my couch and loveseat.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good for small jobs, not much more
customer_reviews.text: It works, but not that great. Socket where handle attaches to the head is made of the same flexible rubber as the bristles/squeegee blade, so when you apply any kind of firm pressure the head pops off the handle. Fixed mine with some gorilla tape, but this is simply poor design. If they just made the socket deeper, or thicker-walled, it might stay together. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: private please

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Broom/Squeegee works just OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for quick pet hair clean up. I don't feel it does as good a job on my wood floors. I prefer my dust mop and eye vac for a quick wall to wall dusting. I haven't used it for a wet floor at this time but figure it will be used mostly for the garage. When I use it on the carpet for quick clean up I feel I have to work harder than I thought I would. It's just OK. I wanted something quick that I didn't have to plug in or bend down to get cat/dog hair off of stairs and carpeted hall. Oh well. It works. Sort of. I'm not thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: I have a bulldog who sheds like crazy and bought one of the more expensive rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: While the rubber bristles do the job, the handle comes off during sweeping. I have a bulldog who sheds like crazy and bought one of the more expensive rubber brooms here on Amazon. For $25, the broom handle should not come out of the broom and scratch my floor. I am returning it. The design flaw seems to be that the handle has the spiral bottom to screw in, but the broom head is smooth rubber. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Beats the vacuum cleaner for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: Having 4 dogs who spend most of their time sleeping on our living room rug, getting up the hair was a challenge. I can't decide whether the broom or squeegee does the best job, because they are both superior to my expensive, commercial grade, German cleaner when it comes to picking up hair. The broom side makes the fringe look like new, and I love the way it works on the hardwood floors too. If I use it on the porch or patio, It can be hosed off in seconds. I use it to scrub the tall windows. Works great! Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Works for carpeting and your arms.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use. If you don't use a pulling motion then you threaten to break it. It does work but you'll get a good arm and back work out, so you can skip the gym. We have a German Shepherd Dog and a Jack Russell Terrier so we have both long and short hair on our low pile carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Wyld

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had a similar sweeper before and it was , hard to use.  This one is Awesome, works great!!
customer_reviews.text: The handle is very sturdy and a good longer length. The sweeper rubber bristles are sturdy and truly do a better job at cleaning. It’s so easy to clean. I use it on my carpet because I have a shedding dog and it picks up it all. I have trec decking and porch that can’t be power washed. Pollen, dirt, snow, rain gets into the tiny spaces and the sweeper cleans easily and thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good broom but.....
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my composite deck to sweep it and to squeegee any water off. Someone in another review said the handle fell off. I ordered it anyway because it looked like the one I had previously and liked alot. Well the handle fell off the first time I used it. I will have to somehow put a small screw in it to keep it on. I shouldn't have to do this, but I will. Will try to order a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: marshafransos

customer_reviews.title: Quality broom.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who was unhappy with the previous broom ,I ordered for her. She said this broom is far superior.The brush is excellent . (It sweeps away from you) & the the squeegee is pulled toward you. She said The broom is a quality product & very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: June McCann

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a broom such as this one while Stationed in Germany. We have dogs and this broom worked better than any other broom on the market. Once back in the USA and the broom finally wore out - We immediately went on Amazon and found this Broom as a replacement. It works so well, this is the 3rd broom we bought in the past year or so. Not for us but for our daughter and then my sister-in-law. Once someone uses it they must have it!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Broom pieces don't stay together.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried and tried for almost a year to keep the handle screwed into rubber bristles portion of this broom. I love the way it works as I have had a different brand before, and it picks up dog hair without it flying everywhere. BUT the handle will not stay screwed in no matter what my husband or I do. I'll keep looking for one that works so that I don't have hair flying. So disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do what it promises. Does not pick up pet hair, it just drives it deeper into the carpeting. Handle way too llong. It's just right if you're over 6 ft tall. The head is hard to screw on the handle, you can easily strip the threads. A real disappointment. Wish the handle telescoped. Squeegee head too soft to pick up liquids. I needed this for pet hair but it is useless. I'll keep it in the garage. The ad sounded too good to be true and it was. A real piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: AshGrayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat The Sweep
customer_reviews.text: Love this broom. I have one very similar that I bought years ago but was looking for one a little wider as my dog sheds like crazy during the winter months. Not only does it get the hair but the squeegee gets the fine grit from shoes or sand from the dogs paws. This is perfect when you have vacuumed the day before and just need to get the job done quicker. I have two adult children and had one shipped to each of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific broom! Works great on tile floors and carpet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to get dog and cat hair off the carpet before vacuuming as it was clogging vacuum roller brush. Works great for that but what surprised me was how well it worked on the tile floors. So much better than a dust mop or a regular broom. I was really surprised at how easy it was to sweep up quickly and efficiently using this product.
customer_reviews.author: jungle lou

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Why did it take me so long to purchase this read about it online/facebook does exactly as described you can't go wrong buying this product goes from carpet to tile to laminate flooring all in one cleaning device!
customer_reviews.author: CQB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality sweeper.
customer_reviews.text: I have indoor pets and a large porch that collects water in one spot. My OLD rubber scrubber was dropping bristles and the squeegee had hardened. I hesitated because some of the sweepers seemed to be low quality according to Amazon reviewers. My two previous sweepers averaged about three years. The only thing that may be lacking is the squeegee. I have not had our torrential rainy season to test it out yet, but the angle or length appears ineffective for pushing water away. My impression was incorrect, Sweep Clean Rubber Broom squeegee's very well in any direction, so I have amended my review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: VSP

customer_reviews.title: Great for animal hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for getting dog hair and baby food off of my floor. I vacuum with an animal hair expensive vacuum and then use this on my rugs and it seriously pics up more hair than the vacuum can. It’s great for sweeping the kitchen after my children make a mess as well, and I love that you can wash it after if it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: So-so. It does help rake up dog hair and the like, but the "rake tines" are flat, blunted and cannot really get down into the nap of a carpet.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Happy and humbled
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this broom. I have had several of these brooms (different sellers) and have always loved them. The rubber broom/squeegee on this one, however, comes off at the slightest resistance making it useless. I am going to contact the seller to see what their policy is for returning useless items. Update 2/25/18......the problem that I was experiencing with the broom was because I hadn't screwed the broom tightly enough onto the handle......my error not a product defect.... now that that is corrected, I am very happy with the broom. My apologies for posting a negative review!
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand. Handle falls off repeatedly!
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept because I love that it sweeps hair. UGH! Every third stroke, you have to STOP and re screw the broom to the handle!!!! Your back is KILLING you when you are finally done.
customer_reviews.author: Y Hooper

customer_reviews.title: I seem to be doing better with it now and man does it pick up ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this at the suggestion of those at my salon, who said it picks up hair really well. Initially, I seemed to have a lot of trouble with it as the broom head kept coming off. That's why only four stars. However, I seem to be doing better with it now and man does it pick up dog hair. With shedding season here, I am using it daily and loving it. Picks stuff up on the floor, including fine dog hair, really well.
customer_reviews.author: wyohalter

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. We run it over the carpet before vacuuming and it picks up hair that would otherwise tangle up the vacuum feeder/rollers. The brush occasionally comes off the handle, so I gave it four instead of five stars.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my patio which has indoor outdoor carpet. The leaves (and there are a lot of them!) just pulled away from the carpet in a perfect bundle for me to pick up. I tried this on my carpet and it picked up the dog hair. It is easy to used, it just glides.
customer_reviews.author: karmajane

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is an Excellant broom. I have used it to quickly go over the carpet and it picks up dog and cat hair easily. The head is big enough to sweep the patio quickly
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Best broom ever
customer_reviews.text: I lover this broom. This is my second one of this kind. I have had this style for about 15 to 20 years now. I will not go back to the old one again. It works on any kind of floor and my husband uses it for snow on cars and trucks and I don't worry about scratches. Best broom ever!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A. Schouw

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I own a few shredders and this is great! The squeegee on the back great to for water bowl swimmers! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Talia O

customer_reviews.title: Maybe OK for pet hair, but... not for squeegee
customer_reviews.text: purchased this to clean porcelain tile patio. Even with a lot of water, the brush is too sticky and the squeegee is poorly placed to make it usable.
customer_reviews.author: Great One

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it seemed to operate on the same premise as a similar gizmo I use to get dog hair off my upholstered furniture. But it doesn't really. You have to work REALLY hard to get any dog hair at all. So I'm sticking to my vacuum for the carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!  Makes the carpet look brand new!
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use! Makes the carpet look brand new! My husband loves “racking” the carpet on Saturday and Sunday mornings while I cook breakfast! Lol! He’s getting really good at it!
customer_reviews.author: I love cats

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but getting it was difficult
customer_reviews.text: Love the broom with the squeegee. Loved it so much I purchased one for a friend and one for our camp. Amazon sent the squeegee only. Due to where I live it would take a good part of the day to return the products, I live in Louisiana two hurricanes have had a great impact on our state. So I ordered again. PLEASE SEND THE CORRECT BROOM. PLEASE!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Sweeps German Shepherd Dog Hair!
customer_reviews.text: If only my dog could do house chores and clean up after himself. This broom is the best for all the chores he can't do. It sweeps up the dirt from his tracks on the kitchen floor as well as the hardwood floor. This is the best investment I ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Orr

customer_reviews.title: This is great for removing pet hair and other small particles from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for removing pet hair and other small particles from carpet...however you must still use a broom and dust pan to pick up after you get a pile of hair. Also it must be used as a rake. You can only make pulling motion with it. Any attempt to use in a forward sweeping motion results in head falling off and you have to reattach it to handle. Still glad I bought it though as it does remove lots of hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesn’t perform like a regular broom.
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with long hair. This works great getting hair out of the corners. Not like a regular broom; you can’t push it along. You will have to clean the rubber bristles often.
customer_reviews.author: l q

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning up hair
customer_reviews.text: Not really what I expected for the money, but it works pretty well. The handle comes off frequently, but screws right back in. It’s fairly easy to use & easy to clean. It does pick up hair very well.
customer_reviews.author: SandJ

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever-especially if your carpet is old!
customer_reviews.text: Love this broom- have a golden retriever and a cat. Use the rug take first- vacuum- and then can still pick up hair after-and I use a furmanator on both animals! But it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well but rubber part won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work so bad. And it actually would be pretty awesome if the rubber attachment head part would stay on. But it doesn't. If you use much force at all, to get the pet hair out, it just pops off. So annoying. It does work well on hardwood floors though, just not carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle N Scott

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The rubber broom end keeps falling off handle. That said, when it stays on it works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: R Salman

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Got this to clean the dirt off my deck. Worked well on the wood.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom
customer_reviews.text: A great product for sweeping dog hair and sand off my lanai. However, the seller needs to contract with another shipper other than the USPS. It came in a long box which the post office couldn’t fit in their vehicle so I had to physically go to the post office which was very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G

customer_reviews.title: Do you want to spend $35 for this product you could just take the $35 and flush it down the toilet
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product that you could possibly buy it comes apart every 10 seconds there is no way that something that has rubber threads on it that goes into a rubber connection is going to stay intact for more than 5 Seconds it is the biggest piece of crap you could possibly buy if you want a migraine headache purchase this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product lifts the nap of the carpet to give it a new look, but that's about all it does. We have 2 labs that shed alot. Using this broom did not lift the dog hair . The head screws on but comes off very easily, not by unscrewing but just by pulling off when using. I am VERY disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: nancy d

customer_reviews.title: The rubber broom is fantastic inside and out
customer_reviews.text: The rubber broom is fantastic inside and out. Inside it sweeps up everything expecially animal hair. The rubber head piece lasts for years.
customer_reviews.author: AJac B

customer_reviews.title: Pole slips out of base, not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting up pet hair, but after a few uses the pole came out of the base; twisted back in, but comes out at least once a day. And it doesn’t get into corners well—we need one of these that’s shaped like a normal broom with longer ‘bristles’ to go into corners.
customer_reviews.author: DRK

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed in the rake
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't screw the handle onto the rake. I had to go to the hardware store and have them make me a new handle. I am disappointed in the rake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The rubber brush does not stay attached to pole.
customer_reviews.text: Everything i bush my hardwood floor with it, the bottom Detaches from the pole. It will not stay Screwed in...This is the 2nd one i got. Return the first one For the same reason I thought it was defective. But the 2nd one does exactly the same thing. Definitely returning this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ancich

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom!
customer_reviews.text: Broom works great! Work for a manufacturing plant and at lunch time we play sand volleyball outside. Well, naturally we would bring sand in the building and regular straw brooms would leave so much sand on the floor still. This broom really gets the sand swept clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gin C

customer_reviews.title: falling apart in one use
customer_reviews.text: Rubber teeth coming out in one use. Does not rake a carpet well. Maybe good for driveway
customer_reviews.author: ALICE ENAULT

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The handle is great nice and sturdy. Wish the bristles were shorter doesn't get the job done as good as i would like..
customer_reviews.author: crystal Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Broom & Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Picks up dust nicely and doesn't spread the dust out as corn brooms do.
customer_reviews.author: bluewing365

customer_reviews.title: Put your back into it
customer_reviews.text: I need to use extra muscle to get rid of dog hair on the carpet. It does work, but takes some strength
customer_reviews.author: Lady who purchases

customer_reviews.title: I am the proud owner of a beautiful, intelligent and loving rescue
customer_reviews.text: I am the proud owner of a beautiful, intelligent and loving rescue . . . I was not so proud on the days I didn't vacuum and the ac swirled pet hair throughout my house. Thank you, Ravmag Rubber Broom! A quick swipe and those are now under control. Vacuuming still, of course, but much less! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Laney

customer_reviews.title: Don't Not Have One
customer_reviews.text: Great for skimming dog toy shreds and fluff from low and med pile carpets. Super for sweeping kitchen tile floor quick, thorough and easy no hassle or hard work. Had one years ago and forgot how handy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not effective.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber bristles are far too soft to clean or to remove pet hair, so it’s like dragging a heavy piece of rubber. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love this broom
customer_reviews.text: This broom is one of the best things I've bought online. Having 2 dogs, hardwood floors and allergies I dreaded sweeping day. This broom makes a world of difference! It leaves the floors shiny clean without kicking fur and dust up into the air. Love it so much, I bought one for my friend too.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Dakota

customer_reviews.title: The rubber broomhead is great, but handle broke after a week
customer_reviews.text: The long red handle is extremely fragile and broke after only a week. Otherwise, the head was fantastic for sweeping up hair.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McArthur

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sweep
customer_reviews.text: You have got to purchase one in your lifetime. What a great product never misses anything on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Wrong broom
customer_reviews.text: It was wrong broom for my needs need the flat rubber broom
customer_reviews.author: lynn potenza

customer_reviews.title: Great on pet hair
customer_reviews.text: It works well on dirt and pet hair. It doesn't cause the pet hair or dust to go air born like my regular broom does. Because of it's design it is easier to get under furniture. Best broom I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest broom ever! Sweeps up dirt and dog hair easily. Absolutely love this broom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I am using this for years. Just the best one!
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use this a couple weeks ago and it sucks. The brush piece is suppose to screw on...it screws on but comes off right of way. I tried to duct tape it to the pole and it still came off
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Medina

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this broom. It does as advertised. I have a small dog and the pictures are after I vacuumed with my dyson vacuum cleaner! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: negeen

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of hardwood flooring and two long haired dogs, this broom is the best at getting every hair and small piece of dirt up. It's awesome. I am even buying one for my sister. You really won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: carson

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product. My old rubber broom was wearing out from so much use and I searched everywhere for a replacement. You can't believe how excited I was when I finally discovered your product!
customer_reviews.author: MamaCass1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is saving my vacuum from the bearing destroying nature of my wife's hair.
customer_reviews.author: BO12

customer_reviews.title: Handle falls off repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for dog fur. Works very well. I would love to give it 5 stars but the handle constantly falls off
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: I brought this one and another one that is thinner and better on edges
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. I brought this one and another one that is thinner and better on edges. This one is heavier and seems to come off somewhat easy. Prefer the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Nori Sehar

customer_reviews.title: This product does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on indoor low pile carpet, I have long hair and used it to pick it up from carpet before vaccuming. Very easy to remove hair from rubber bristles as opposed to bristles on vaccum. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Norma miller

customer_reviews.title: Not much help on carpet and rugs which is why I wanted it.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this broom would get dog hair out of the carpet. I read reviews and had it recommended; however, it did not do nearly as well as I'd hoped. It's ok on our cork floors, however.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job on hardwood floors. Not the easiest for rugs. It works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for cleaning up pet hair in the house on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product works but because the broom part is rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works but because the broom part is rubber - you have to use a little extra pressure to get the animal hair up. It takes several sweeps to get the hair loosen
customer_reviews.author: Liz Collier

customer_reviews.title: Best broom - must replace any other indoor broom
customer_reviews.text: Best broom Collects all dust and hair easily and quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as described - I had no issues with the handle as others had reported
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love love love this broom, works wonders on hardwood floors
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: I really like this broom. It sweeps my hard wood and linoleum floors really well. My only complaint, the diameter of the broom handle is too small to attach my dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Good for sweeping up cat hair
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it “rolled “ the cat hair up and the hair didn’t go flying across the room.
customer_reviews.author: jeanie spraggs

customer_reviews.title: I'd like it to be a bit stiffer and it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay broom. I'd like it to be a bit stiffer and it's not the same as the one I've had for 15 years and loved but it is okay.
customer_reviews.author: MSL

customer_reviews.title: WRONG STICK
customer_reviews.text: THE THREAD DOES NOT MATCH THE BROOM/SQUEEGEE. I'LL GET THE RIGHT STICK FOR IT.
customer_reviews.author: lance

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Glad our friend told us about RAVMAG. We love it for our dogs hair. Told my daughter in law she bought it also and sent us a picture of dog hair she thought she got up.
customer_reviews.author: Davida Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not work nearly as well for picking up dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't be using a traditional broom again!
customer_reviews.text: Best broom I've ever used. I didn't realize how much dog hair my old broom left behind. So glad I made the switch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing... I wish they had it again, I told so many people about it and now you can't get it. Sorry guys..... I would have got another one too.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Mangold

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work as advertised. Doesn't do well with hair on rugs. That is what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Rubber teeth?
customer_reviews.text: I love these kind of brooms. My last one did not have individuated teeth as this one does. Unfortunately, the rubber teeth are already starting to tear.I looked for a broom similar to the one I bought but could not find it in your catalog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably easy and has saved my back. Works on carpets, area rugs, throw rugs and bare floors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The dog fur eliminator!
customer_reviews.text: If you have hard floors and you have a pet that sheds this baby will make your pursuit of hairy free floors a breeze. Seriously wish I had this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: VerdeValleyReader

customer_reviews.title: Collects hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that's been able to collect the long human hair and long dog hair In our home. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: my One-Sweep handle broke after 10 yrs, time for an upgrade. Got it today, love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smyth

customer_reviews.title: I love this broom
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom. I use it every day on my wood and tile floors to sweep my floors. It is great for catching all the dust bunnies deposited by my cats and dog.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

product_meta.title: RAVMAG Rubber Broom
feature_bullets: INCREDIBLE CLEANING TOOL: Ravmag’s large rubber broom will get your floors cleaner than ever with less time and less effort to do it. The versatile broom sweeps wet and dry surfaces and can be used indoors and outdoors with the same great results.

WATER-RESISTANT NATURAL RUBBER BRISTLES: Made from natural rubber which requires little maintenance for short and long-term use. The rubber is easy to clean, won’t lose shape, and will last for years.

CARPET PET HAIR REMOVER: The bristles have advanced cleaning technology that works to lift dust, dirt lint and hair. use it to quickly remove pet hair from high traffic areas and where your dog or cat like to sleep.

HIGH QUALITY DESIGN: Made of 100% TPR rubber, this broom is designed for the most grueling jobs. It is tough enough to handle any job, yet won’t damage any surfaces. it comes with 55’’ sturdy steel handle with a powder-coated finish. The long length lets you get to hard-to-reach places.

MULTI-PURPOSE SQUEEGEE: Finish you cleaning session by using the squeegee tool for moving water toward a drain or off your deck for a no-mess solution to cutting dirt and grime in and around your home. Squeegee can be used for windows, showers, car windshield and more.
